newsitem.title: CHINA: Local air-conditioners top China market.
newsitem.headline: Local air-conditioners top China market.

text.p: Domestically made air conditioners had 65.6 percent of the Chinese urban market in August, the Business News on Friday quoted a survey of 106 large commercial centres in 35 major cities as saying.

The top selling brand was Qingdao Haier Refrigerator Co with 12.2 percent of the market, followed by Guangdong Kelon Electrical Holdings Co Ltd with 11.3 percent and Jiangsu Chunlan Refrigerating Equipment Stock Co with 5.5 percent, it said.
Imported models accounted for 34.4 percent of the national market in August, the survey said.
Penetration by imports was highest in eastern China, with 49 percent of the market, and lowest in the northwest with 17.4 percent, it added.
